entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as yelling and dangled helplessly upside-down after his heel was wrenched upwards. He is also mentioned to be slowly turning purple in the face due to blood rushing to his head.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as bellowing and trying to understand what happened to Ron. He also saw a box lying open on Ron's bed with Chocolate Cauldrons inside.

relationships.description: Ron insulted Harry, which led to the current situation.
Harry was offended by Ron's joke.
Ron is the owner of the Chocolate Cauldrons, which were a birthday present.
Harry was supposed to receive the Chocolate Cauldrons as a gift from Ron.
